Package uk.gov.hmcts.ecm.common.service.pdf.et1

Class PdfMapperServiceUtil

java.lang.Object
uk.gov.hmcts.ecm.common.service.pdf.et1.PdfMapperServiceUtil
public final class PdfMapperServiceUtil extends Object
This class is implemented as a utility for PDF Mapper class. All methods and variables are defined as static. There is a private constructor implemented not to let class have a public or default constructor because it is a utility class
Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • formatAddressForTextField

      public static String formatAddressForTextField(Address address)
      Returns a string value for the given Address. Address has 6 values to be converted to String for showing them in PDF text fields. 3 of those values which are AddressLine1, PostTown and Country are compulsory fields. If one or more of those is not entered it returns null. Adds all fields to a string by adding comma and new line to each field. All fields are also converted to have each of their wordings start with a capital letter.
      Parameters:
      address - model that holds address data
      Returns:
      converted String value of address model.

    • formatPostcode

      public static String formatPostcode(Address address)
      Removes all space characters in between all country's postcode characters. If postcode is a postcode in the UK. UK postcode has a space character before 3rd character of it's last character. Such as SL63NY should be formatted as SL6 3NY or WF102SX as WF10 2SX etc...
      Parameters:
      address - address model that holds address data
      Returns:
      formatted String value of Postcode

    • formatDate

      public static String formatDate(String dateToFormat)
      Formats date from YYYY/MM/DD to DD/MM/YYYY.
      Parameters:
      dateToFormat - String value of date to be formatted
      Returns:
      Formatted date

    • generateClaimantCompensation

      public static String generateClaimantCompensation(CaseData caseData)
      Generates claimant compensation value according to given compensation text and amount. If claimant compensation text is null, blank or just ":" sets compensation text to blank string If claimant compensation amount is null, blank or just ":" sets compensation amount to blank string If claimant compensation text exists adds text to claimant compensation If claimant compensation amount exists adds text to claimant compensation
      Parameters:
      caseData - uses claimantReqest, claimantCompensationText and claimantCompensationAmount
      Returns:
      claimantCompensation as a text field.

    • generateClaimantTribunalRecommendation

      public static String generateClaimantTribunalRecommendation(CaseData caseData)
      Generates claimant tribunal recommendation value according to given claimant tribunal recommendation. If claimant tribunal recommendation value is null returns an empty string If claimant tribunal recommendation value exists returns this value by adding Tribunal recommendation prefix
      Parameters:
      caseData - uses claimantRequests claimantTribunalRecommendation
      Returns:
      claimantTribunalRecommendation not null value

    • isYes

      public static boolean isYes(String stringValue)
